EmailTemplate.name: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1561484055.0)
EmailTemplate.subject: Grand & Toy Contact Information, Account Manager (1561484055.0)
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi Alice,
I hope all is well and that you're receiving Jennifer's emails while she is on maternity leave. I am your Account Manager with Grand & Toy so if there is anything I can assist with please feel free to reach out to me and let me know. I look forward to working with you. Thank you and have a good day.
Cheers,
Lorne Sawyer Inside Account Manager 900 Belfast Rd, Ottawa, ON, K1Z 0G6 E-mail: LorneSawyer@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:FirstnameLastname@grandandtoy.com]]> Toll Free: 1-800-348-2184 x42534 For your day-to-day requirements please contact our Customer Service Centre 1-866-391-8111 CustomerService@grandandtoy.com <[[mailto:CustomerService@grandandtoy.com]]>

If you have received this email in error, please immediately notify the sender and delete it from your system.​
